issue.title: [CF 1194] In-game sharing doesn't work.
issue.body:
Hey. "Allow in-game sharing" checked. But nothing happens.  We have 7.4.0. both.


> Posted by CurseForge user Ckotuna | Imported from CurseForge issue #1194 | Raw

comments.body:
What method of sharing did you use? Whispers? I'm not sure how well that works if you're on different servers.

If one or both of you had just enabled that setting, note that it requires a reload to start accepting communications.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Unable to reproduce.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
